----
### OBJETIVO 
In RSA d is a lot bigger than e, why don't we use d to encrypt instead of e? Connect withÂ `nc jupiter.challenges.picoctf.org 19566`.

---
### SOLUCION
Solo le damos a e su valor por defecto y lo remplazamos por d en la formula
``` python
>>> c= 
>>> 
>>> e=65537
>>> m=pow(c,e,n)
>>> from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytes
>>> long_to_bytes(m)
b'picoCTF{bad_1d3a5_2438125}'

```
